title: Weather Api
content: A Web App which allows user to search for different weather conditions across India. Fetches data from a weather api.

title: Text Utils
content: A Web App which allows user to enter text and play with it. A user can convert the text to lowercase or uppercase or can copy the text.

title: IOT Based Security Door Lock System
content: An Iot based software in which a user can open or close the door lock by their mobile device.

title: Fithub
content: An android app in which a user can scan edible objects and get its respective calorie count. In this app user can also have its own diet chart.
